comment: Smart Data models - FleetVehicleOperation schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/master/FleetVehicleOperation/schema.json
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic fleet vehicle operation such as a delivery, or a postal collection. This entity is primarily associated with the vertical segment of the transport and logistics but may also be used many other related IoT applications.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: endedAt
contents.comment: The end date and time of the event when the event or operation is known to be over/complete. Null/omitted if not yet ended

contents.name: operationType
contents.comment: The free text type of the event or operation e.g. e.g. Call for a patient transportation, postal collection, delivery, close to a restricted area, overspeed

contents.name: responseTime
contents.comment: Indicates the time to respond to an event, in seconds. The associated observedAt timestamp indicates when the last update was recorded. E.g. records the response time for an ambulance to reach to a patient

contents.name: result
contents.comment: The final result of the event or operation

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: startedAt
contents.comment: The start date and time when the event or operation was triggered

contents.name: transportTime
contents.comment: Indicates the time that the fleet vehicle has spent transporting people or supplies for the current operation. E.g. indicates the time an ambulance spent transporting a patient to a hospital emergency department

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
